articles.title: Oldest species of swimming jellyfish discovered in 505m-year-old fossils - The Guardian
articles.description: New species named Burgessomedusa phasmiformis was found in Canada and is exceptionally well preserved
articles.content:
The oldest species of swimming jellyfish ever recorded has been discovered in 505m-year-old fossils, scientists have said.
